title: Spinola Hours
description: Spinola Hours; Master of James IV of Scotland (Flemish, before 1465 - about 1541), Master of the Dresden Prayer Book (Flemish, active about 1480 - 1515), Master of the Lübeck Bible (Flemish, about 1485-about 1520), et al; Bruges, Belgium; about 1510 - 1520; Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with red morocco; Leaf: 23.2 × 16.7 cm (9 1/8 × 6 9/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 18; J.
